data.name: Northstar
data.description: Jean-Paul Beaubier brings his mutant powers of super speed and light generation (as well as an abrasive personality) to Alpha Flight as Northstar!

starItems.name: Northstar
starItems.description: Jean-Paul Beaubier brings his mutant powers of super speed and light generation (as well as an abrasive personality) to Alpha Flight as Northstar!

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
If this character has <color=#86e619>10</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If this character has:
 > <color=#86e619>1</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.
 > <color=#86e619>10</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> on each secondary attack
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on each secondary attack instead

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.
 > <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> on each secondary attack.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on each secondary attack instead.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Rebound Chain for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage to a number of adjacent targets equal to the number of <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a max of <color=#86e619>10</color>.
 > <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> on each secondary attack.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on each secondary attack instead.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.

2.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.

3.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
Flip all positive effects on all enemies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies

4.description:
Flip all positive effects + clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

5.description:
Flip all positive effects + clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to all enemies

6.description:
Flip all positive effects + clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>

7.description:
Flip all positive effects + clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> on all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn, and prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on all enemies.
This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this character.

On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>250%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for self and <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this character.

On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>250%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this character.

On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>250%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, enemy characters cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this character.

On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, enemy characters cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>250%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this character.

On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, enemy characters cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > On enemy Death, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>250%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed. <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Speed.
